Interrupts.Name: Counter-strike
Interrupts.Trigger: The Jotunn or an adjacent ally is hit or miss by a melee attack.
Interrupts.Effects: The attacker is shoved 1 and must save. On a failed save, they take fray damage and are dazed.

Actions.Name: Bloody Fuller
Effects: Deals added damage, hit or miss, equal to 2 times the round number.
